last_episode_to_air.name: The Truth
last_episode_to_air.overview: Armed with DNA evidence that links his father to the Zodiac killer, Gary forges ahead trying to uncover his truth. Meanwhile, a San Francisco based private investigator digs into Susan and Gary's claims. The questions that have haunted Gary for decades culminate in an unexpected end.

name: The Most Dangerous Animal of All
original_name: The Most Dangerous Animal of All
overview: Soon after his birth-mother contacted him for the first time, Gary L. Stewart decided to search for his biological father. His disturbing identity would force Stewart to reconsider everything he thought he knew about himself.
